metadata.synopsis: Army attorney Maj. Steve Garrett (Kirk Douglas) must defend four American soldiers -- part of the forces occupying a small town in Germany -- who drunkenly raped a 19-year-old girl (Christine Kaufmann). The girl's enraged father demands the soldiers receive the death penalty. Determined to defend the men's lives, Garrett demolishes the girl on the witness stand. When she faints before completing testimony, the defendants are spared, but tragedy follows.

reviews: If it had more going for it than [Kirk] Douglas's electrifying performance ... I'd recommend it
A grim courtroom drama about a shocking gang rape.
Moralmente complexo, o filme analisa a estigmatizao das vtimas de estupro e conta com uma atuao brilhante de Douglas como um homem torturado por seus deveres.
